meaningMnemonic: You see <radical>horns</radical> on a <radical>lantern</radical> that can hold <radical>ten thousand</radical> <radical>drops</radical> of water sitting on the <radical>ground</radical>. You get closer and realize it's not a lantern, it's actually a <kanji>bottle</kanji>. The horns are like a weird handle, but it's definitely a bottle filled with water.
readingMnemonic: Even though you're not the one who left this <kanji>bottle</kanji> here, you decide to do the right thing and throw it in the trash <reading>bin</reading> (びん). It's not right to leave a bottle just sitting on the ground, you know.
